name: Huwai v7y
desc: Nokia X100 mobile was launched on 10th November 2021. The phone comes with a 6.67-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 2400x1080 pixels and an aspect ratio of 20:9. Nokia X100 is powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 480 processor.

name: Realme Q3T
desc: Realme Q3t has been launched in China. The new handset comes in two colour options and features a 6.6-inch full-HD+ (1,080x2,412 pixels) IPS LCD display. Realme Q3t carries a triple rear camera setup, headlined by 48-megapixel primary snapper.

name: Tecno Spark 8
desc: Tecno Spark 8â€™s new variant with 3GB of RAM and 32GB of storage was launched in India. The smartphone has a few differences from the one that debuted in September, including a larger 6.56-inch display and MediaTek Helio G25 gaming SoC.

name: ZTE Blade L9
desc: ZTE Blade L9 entry-level smartphone has been launched in Mexico. The smartphone comes with a 5-inch display, a Unisoc SoC, 8-megapixel rear camera for Bokeh-like portraits, and runs Android 11 (Go Edition). It has a 2,000mAh battery, with an intelligent power-saving mode.

name: Infinix Note 11S
desc: Infinix Note 11S has been launched in Thailand. The new handset comes in three colour options and features a 6.95-inch full-HD+ IPS LCD display. Infinix Note 11S carries a triple rear camera setup, headlined by 50-megapixel primary snapper.

name: Lava Agni 5G
desc: Lava Agni 5G mobile was launched on 9th November 2021. The phone comes with a 6.78-inch touchscreen display. Lava Agni 5G is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 810 processor.

name: Poco M4 Pro 5G
desc: Poco M4 Pro 5G  was launched on 9th November 2021. The phone comes with a 6.78-inch touchscreen display. Lava Agni 5G is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 810 processor.

name: Vivo Y15s (2021)
desc: Vivo Y15s (2021) was launched on 9th November 2021. The phone comes with a 6.78-inch touchscreen display. Lava Agni 5G is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 810 processor.

name: Samsung Galaxy A22s 5G
desc: Samsung Galaxy A22s 5G  launched on 9th November 2021. The phone comes with a 6.78-inch touchscreen display. Lava Agni 5G is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 810 processor.
